refnamediv.refpurpose: Iteratively reduce the array to a single value using a callback function

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: array_reduce applies iteratively the callback function to the elements of the array input, so as to reduce the array to a single value. If the optional initial is available, it will be used at the beginning of the process, or as a final result in case the array is empty.

example.title: array_reduce example

refsect1.para: This will result in $b containing 15, $c containing 1200 (= 1*2*3*4*5*10), and $d containing 1.
